title: [RESOLVED] 10/9 Players unable to login
body:
>#Update 6:37PM

>All signs are pointing towards logins working again.  Looks like one of the backend systems responsible for logins briefly went down, which caused players to be unable to log in during that time.
>
>Everything seems back to normal, but we'll be keeping an eye just in case we notice more errors.

----

At ~6:11 PM we saw an increased rate of errors when players were trying to log in, particularly players from the east coast.  Investigations are underway and we'll keep this thread updated with more information

replies.body:
I was in the middle of a game and disconnected. I cannot reconnect right now so if the game ends and i get a ban, can that be removed?
Summoner name-     LookAtTheBunny
I'd go ahead and try to reconnect.  Signs are looking good for things to be back to normal (fingers crossed).
i keep having to reconnect after champ select and i keep pressing it and nothing happens i got a leaver for this if anyone knows the solution
Still unable to, located on the west coast
Nope, still cannot log in

It should be working now, It is for me.
I'm pretty sure you wouldn't get a ban for a disconnection, since it isn't your fault.

I experienced these issues on 10/5/17, I have not been able to login all day today. I'm on the west coast, have never had problems with lag or anything until these instances. Is this related to the eat coast problems? Or is it some how a coincidence? Please help
I still can't connect, on the west coast.

West coast shouldn't have been affected by this outage given the circumstances, so I'd recommend submitting a player support ticket to have someone look at what's going on in your specific case.  If nothing else, helps us keep track so we can see whether or not the west coast is having similar issues as a whole
Confirmed East coast issue.  VPNing to a West coast endpoint got me logged in.  Then I was able to disconnect VPN and the client re-synced connection successfully without kicking me out.
then why am i getting boned I'm on the west coast
Because Anecdotal confirmation is hardly reliable?  Maybe it's an intermittent issue that affects some percentage of all login attempts and I just got lucky on my VPN-ed attempt.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}  right when i wanna play some league

> [{quoted}](name=XªO,realm=NA,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=FcZeEbwc,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-10-10T01:34:37.917+0000)
>
> {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}  right when i wanna play some league

I know right lol
{{champion:202}} 
I just wanted to play big daddy Jhin after a hard days work lol

it should be back
works fone for me :o

Hey! topCyder from the subreddit and discord here.

Thought I would toss the reports we have been getting.

From what I can tell, its mainly East Coast, and everyone who has confirmed an ISP has said Verizon. I am still asking users who are reporting it to let me know where they are from and what ISP they use.

Hope this helps a bit!

I'm using AT&T in South Carolina and I can't log in. Had to leave game after getting hit with the keybindings glitch where none of my hot keys work upon entering game, tried reloading twice and after that failed to work I tried restarting my client, Have been unable to log in for the past 10-15 minutes
AirWave Networks here

Works for me now
thanks RITO :d
Sucks. I'm trying to play the game after a long day at work and this happens......so what does a man do? Play Destiny 2!!! OHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:4}} I'm out!
Right in a middle of a game I had to reset my router. Then this happens. FeelsBadMan
@Riot, we found the cause.
This issue has not been resolved for me
My duo partner is in Toronto, Canada. Using Bell Network, unable to connect to servers. Send HALP
10 out of 9 players. Wow! that's a lot!

I've been having this problem for a few days but originally experienced it while in game with heavy lag and eventually tried to reconnect but couldn't log back in. The next day i was able to sign in without a problem, but later in the day i couldn't even log in, and I havent been able to ever since.

I wish they would allow the mobile app to send push notifications saying when there are issues with your areas server/client so youd know when to NOT rush home and try signing onto league :*( 
maybe in a future update :D{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

aww come on i wanted to have one more good game of the night...
{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{sticker:sg-shisa}}
I just kept trying and it finally let me log in. Didn't change anything I was doing except came back 20 min later. I am on the east coast and have Comcast Xfinity.
What about the people that had been disconnected mid game?
Who the fuck spilled coffee over the servers?

Getting "Unable to connect to the authentication service" starting tonight. Played fine last night. Reset router, ran Hextech Repair tool, no fix. On the east coast.

EDIT: Just got in.
When i changed my password it worked perfectly fine, so if that helps
